content: जालं {@--1@} A net, snare. {@--2@} ({%a%}) A web, cob-web. ({@--6@}) Any woven texture. {@--3@} A coat of mail, a helmet made of wire. {@--4@} An eye-hole, lattice, window; जालांतरप्रेषितदृष्टिरन्या <ls>R. 7. 9</ls>; धूपैर्जालाविनिः सृतैर्वलभयः संदिग्धपारावताः <ls>V. 3. 2</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 60.</ls> {@--5@} A collection, an assemblage, number, mass; चिंतासंततितंतुजालनिबिडस्यूतेव <ls>Māl. 5. 10</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 89</ls>; <ls>Śi. 4. 56</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 58.</ls> {@--6@} Magic. {@--7@} Illusion, deception. {@--8@} An unblown flower. {@--9@} The membrane which unites the toes of many water-birds. {@--10@} A disease of the eyes. {@--11@} Pride, arrogance. --लः The Kadamba tree.
